fake|account|accindex: A CHAR(12) primary key uniquely identifying each account record (e.g., 'AC1234567890').
fake|account|acctident: A VARCHAR(14) field holding an external-facing or system-defined account identifier (e.g., 'ACC2686094').
fake|account|platident: An 8-character field indicating which platform ID the account is associated with (e.g., 'PL784').
fake|account|plattype: An enum (PlatformType_enum) describing the platform type (Microblog, Social Network, Video Platform, Forum).
fake|account|acctcreatedate: A DATE indicating when the account was created (e.g., '2025-02-20').
fake|account|acctagespan: A SMALLINT showing the account’s age in days since creation (e.g., '45').
fake|account|acctstatus: An enum (AccountStatus_enum) capturing the account status (Active, Deleted, Suspended, Dormant).
fake|account|acctcategory: An enum (AccountType_enum) labeling the account type (Personal, Bot, Hybrid, Business).
fake|account|authstatus: An enum (VerificationStatus_enum) describing the verification state (Unverified, Pending, Failed, Suspicious).
fake|profile|profkey: A CHAR(12) primary key uniquely identifying each profile record (e.g., 'PF1234567890').
fake|profile|profaccref: A CHAR(12) referencing Account(AccIndex), linking this profile to a single account (e.g., 'AC1234567890').
fake|sessionbehavior|sessref: A CHAR(12) primary key uniquely identifying each session behavior record (e.g., 'SE1234567890').
fake|sessionbehavior|logintimepat: An enum (LoginTimePattern_enum) describing login times (Burst, Bot-like, Random, Regular).
fake|sessionbehavior|loginfreq: An enum (LoginFrequency_enum) labeling login frequency (Medium, High, Low, Suspicious).
fake|sessionbehavior|loginlocvar: NUMERIC(4,1) measuring variance in login locations (e.g., '2.7').
fake|sessionbehavior|actregval: NUMERIC(4,2) measuring how regularly the user logs in (e.g., '0.75').
fake|sessionbehavior|acttimedist: A JSONB structure capturing session activity distribution (e.g., '{"morning": 30, "night": 70}').
fake|networkmetrics|netkey: A CHAR(12) primary key for each network metrics record (e.g., 'NE1234567890').
fake|contentbehavior|cntref: A CHAR(12) primary key for each content behavior record (e.g., 'CB1234567890').
fake|contentbehavior|cntlangnum: An enum (ContentLanguageCount_enum) showing language count in posts (1, 2, 3, 4, or 5).
fake|contentbehavior|hashusepat: An enum (HashtagUsagePattern_enum) describing hashtag usage (Trending, Normal, Random, Spam).
fake|contentbehavior|hashratio: NUMERIC(3,2) fraction of posts with at least one hashtag (e.g., '0.23').
fake|contentbehavior|mentionpat: An enum (MentionPattern_enum) describing mention usage (Normal, Random, Targeted, Spam).
fake|contentbehavior|mentionratio: NUMERIC(5,3) fraction of posts with mentions (e.g., '0.568').
fake|contentbehavior|urlsharefreq: A VARCHAR(24) showing how often URLs are shared (e.g., 'HighFreq').
fake|contentbehavior|urldomdiv: NUMERIC(4,2) domain diversity among shared URLs (e.g., '1.23').
fake|contentbehavior|mediaupratio: NUMERIC(5,3) fraction of posts including media (e.g., '0.345').
fake|contentbehavior|mediareratio: NUMERIC(6,4) how often the same media is reused (e.g., '0.2345').
fake|messaginganalysis|msgkey: A CHAR(12) primary key for each messaging analysis record (e.g., 'MA1234567890').
fake|messaginganalysis|msgfreq: NUMERIC(6,2) how frequently messages are sent (e.g., '45.67').
fake|messaginganalysis|resptimepat: An enum (ResponseTimePattern_enum) labeling response speed (Natural, Delayed, Random, Instant).
fake|messaginganalysis|convnatval: NUMERIC(4,3) how natural conversation flow is (e.g., '0.753').
fake|technicalinfo|techkey: A CHAR(12) primary key for each technical info record (e.g., 'TI1234567890').
fake|technicalinfo|regip: An INET column storing the registration IP (e.g., '192.168.0.10').
fake|technicalinfo|ipcountrynum: A SMALLINT tracking how many countries this IP is linked to (e.g., '1').
fake|technicalinfo|vpnratio: A NUMERIC(7,4) fraction indicating VPN usage frequency (e.g., '0.3456').
fake|technicalinfo|proxycount: A SMALLINT counting times a proxy was detected (e.g., '2').
fake|technicalinfo|devtotal: A SMALLINT total number of devices (e.g., '3').
fake|technicalinfo|browserdiv: A NUMERIC(5,3) measure of browser diversity (e.g., '1.230').
fake|securitydetection|secdetkey: A CHAR(12) primary key uniquely identifying each security detection (e.g., 'SD1234567890').
fake|securitydetection|detecttime: A TIMESTAMP noting when the security event was detected (e.g., '2025-03-14 10:15:00').
fake|securitydetection|detectsource: An enum (DetectionSource_enum) for how detection was triggered (Manual Review, User Report, Pattern Match, Algorithm).
fake|securitydetection|lastupd: A TIMESTAMP indicating the last update (e.g., '2025-03-15 05:20:00').
fake|securitydetection|updfreqhrs: A SMALLINT for how often (in hours) re-evaluation occurs (e.g., '24').
fake|moderationaction|modactkey: A CHAR(12) primary key uniquely identifying each moderation action record (e.g., 'MA0000001234').
fake|moderationaction|abuserepnum: A SMALLINT counting how many abuse reports (e.g., '2').
fake|moderationaction|susphist: An enum (SuspensionHistory_enum) detailing past suspensions (0 through 5).
fake|moderationaction|warnnum: A SMALLINT showing how many warnings were issued (e.g., '1').
fake|moderationaction|appealnum: An enum (AppealCount_enum) for how many appeals were filed (0 through 5).
fake|moderationaction|clustsize: A SMALLINT representing the size of the related account cluster (e.g., '10').
fake|moderationaction|clustrole: An enum (ClusterRole_enum) labeling the user’s cluster role (Isolated, Follower, Leader, Amplifier).
fake|moderationaction|impactval: A NUMERIC(4,3) rating the potential impact of the violation (e.g., '1.034').
fake|moderationaction|monitorpriority: An enum (MonitoringPriority_enum) indicating how closely to watch (Low, Medium, Urgent, High).
fake|moderationaction|investstatus: An enum (InvestigationStatus_enum) describing investigation status (Pending, Active, Completed).
fake|moderationaction|actiontaken: An enum (ActionTaken_enum) summarizing final moderation (Suspension, Warning, Restriction).
fake|moderationaction|reviewfreq: An enum (ReviewFrequency_enum) describing re-review frequency (Monthly, Quarterly, Daily, Weekly).
fake|moderationaction|lastrevdate: A DATE showing last moderation review (e.g., '2025-03-20').
fake|moderationaction|nextrevdate: A DATE scheduling the next moderation review (e.g., '2025-04-20').

fake|securitydetection|detection_score_p.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates all granular detection scores, risk indicators, and model‑reliability attributes so the full threat posture of a security event can be inspected with a single JSONB read.

overall.threatlvl: An enum (ThreatLevel_enum) describing threat priority (Critical, High, Low, Medium).
overall.confval: NUMERIC(6,5) confidence in the final detection verdict (e.g., '0.98765').

behavior_scores.autobehavscore: NUMERIC(5,3) rating how automated the user’s behavior is (e.g., '0.754').
behavior_scores.botlikscore: NUMERIC(6,3) capturing the likelihood of bot behavior (e.g., '0.784').

pattern_scores.temppatscore: NUMERIC(6,3) measuring irregularities in temporal patterns (e.g., '1.234').

detection_reliability.modelver: A VARCHAR(12) labeling the detection model version (e.g., 'mdl_v1.3').
detection_reliability.featver: A VARCHAR(12) labeling the detection feature set version (e.g., 'feat_set2').

fake|networkmetrics|network_engagement_m.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups connection‑growth, engagement‑quality, and interaction‑diversity measures into one JSONB field for quick network‑level behaviour profiling.

connection_metrics.follownum: A BIGINT for how many followers the user has (e.g., '12345').
connection_metrics.followingnum: A BIGINT for how many accounts the user follows (e.g., '6789').
connection_metrics.followgrowrate: NUMERIC(4,3) how quickly follower count grows (e.g., '1.234').
connection_metrics.followinggrowrate: NUMERIC(5,4) how quickly following count grows (e.g., '2.5678').
connection_metrics.followratio: NUMERIC(6,2) ratio of followers to following (e.g., '1.50').
connection_metrics.conngrowpat: An enum (ConnectionGrowthPattern_enum) describing connection growth (Suspicious, Burst, Bot-like, Organic).

engagement_metrics.likeratio: NUMERIC(3,2) portion of interactions that are likes (e.g., '0.25').
engagement_metrics.cmtratio: NUMERIC(3,2) portion of interactions that are comments (e.g., '0.30').
engagement_metrics.sharerate: NUMERIC(4,3) portion of interactions that are shares (e.g., '0.456').

interaction_metrics.tempinteractpat: An enum (TemporalInteractionPattern_enum) describing interaction timing (Natural, Periodic, Random, Automated).

fake|profile|profile_composition.column_meaning: JSONB column. Consolidates username, picture, bio, location, and contact‑credibility attributes to streamline profile‑quality checks and downstream ML feature extraction.

fields_meaning.completeness: NUMERIC(3,2) reflecting how complete the profile is (e.g., '0.85').

username.profnametag: An enum (ProfileNamePattern_enum) describing the profile’s name style (Sequential, Template, Random, Natural).
username.usrlen: A SMALLINT indicating how many characters are in the username (e.g., '12').
username.usrpatn: An enum (UsernamePattern_enum) storing the username pattern (Random, Generated, Meaningful, AlphaNum).

display_name.dispnameshift: A SMALLINT counting how many times the display name changed (e.g., '3').

picture.picformat: An enum (ProfilePictureType_enum) describing the profile picture type (Stock, AI Generated, Real, Celebrity).
picture.picscval: NUMERIC(4,1) scoring the authenticity/quality of the picture (e.g., '7.5').

bio.biospan: A SMALLINT measuring bio length in characters (e.g., '160').
bio.biolang: An enum (BioLanguage_enum) for the bio’s language code (en, multiple, mixed, unknown).
bio.biolinknum: An enum (BioLinkCount_enum) for the number of links (0 through 5).
bio.biokeycheck: An enum (BioKeywordMatch_enum) flagging suspicious or notable keywords (Suspicious, Normal, Spam, Promo).

location.locgiven: An enum (LocationProvided_enum) describing location provisioning (Fake, No, Yes, Multiple).
location.locshiftnum: A SMALLINT showing how many times the stated location changed (e.g., '2').

contact.maildomainfmt: An enum (EmailDomainType_enum) describing the email domain (Free, Unknown, Custom, Disposable).
contact.phnumstate: An enum (PhoneNumberStatus_enum) describing phone number status (Invalid, VOIP, Valid).
